title: Have Anyone woke up suddenly from sleep with extreme trauma?
content: Recently It happened to me, I don't know what to do, please help me in this regard

title: Mission flashbacks at scale
content: I have ptsd about a mission i had in UN a few years back. I want to get some professional insights on this, if that helps.

title: I am having severe anxiety attacks lately, please help
content: Severe levels of anxiety has been grasping me lately and I am having severe attacks lately. I need some insightful advice!

title: Sleeplessness is at it's extreme
content: Haven't been able to sleep for straight two days, medications are not helping either, please help me.
